summary: This mod adds new textures to almost every paper object within Skyrim. Also featured are new, varied textures. Now books no longer share the same page texture. Notes are also unique.
descriptionHtml:
((Be aware that because the images are gifs, there is more grain in them which you won't see in-game))

This mod adds new paper to various objects in the world of Skyrim. The items included are: Books, notes, business ledgers, rolls of paper, scrolls, battle maps and the corresponding world objects (such as open books, notes on the wall, etc).

Most textures are double the vanilla resolution (512^2 to 1024^2). The low-res images have been scaled up to 4x their original resolution (256^2 to 1024^).

Also including altered meshes. Now all notes have a unique texture + alpha channels. Journal pages are unique and now there are 7 book page textures, opposed to just 1.

Enjoy!


[color=5ea2e5][b]Installation[/b][/color]


As any texture file, simply unpack the .rar file and merge the data folder with the one in your Skyrim directory.

To uninstall, remove these files from the books folder in [u]Data/textures/clutter/books:[/u]

book01paper.dds
book01paper_n.dds
largebookpaper01.dds
largebookpaper01_n.dds
largebookpaper02.dds
largebookpaper02_n.dds
largebookpaper03.dds
largebookpaper03_n.dds

largebookpaper05_n.dds

largebookpaperohgma01_n.dds

And these files from the character assets folder in [u]Data/meshes/clutter/books/book02/character assets:[/u]

book02da07.nif

book03.nif

You could of course also use the Nexus mod manager.



V 1.0:
-(re)Release

V 2.0:
-All notes now have unique textures + normal maps + alpha maps.
-Added altered meshes to make the above possible.
-Added paper roll re-texture.
-Polished all textures.
-Another re-release, because of the big changes in V2. Will be the last time, I swear! :p

V2.1
-Added scrolls re-texture.
-Added battle maps re-texture.
-Added slightly altered treasure map overlays, to better blend in with the new note paper.

V2.2
-Edited the alpha map of the basic note (+bloody version). I thought the tears were a little too much.
-Edited the note with the wax seal to have some more color, like the original.
-Added unique journal page textures.
-Added altered journal meshes to make the above possible.

V2.3
-Added new textures to add more variety to book pages.
-Added altered book meshes to make the above possible.
-Made some adjustments to the journal page textures.
-Made some adjustments to the dragon map texture. Didn't realize it said Skyrim ;p
-Made some adjustments to the scrolls texture. There was a slightly visible black line in-game. That should be gone now.
-Removed mipmaps from the textures that you only see within an interface environment. File sizes are reduced; possibly the quality is improved.

[center]

[/center]
author: Anarin

files.name: HQ Paper
files.changelogHtml:
Added new textures to add more variety to book pages; Added altered book meshes to make this possible.
Made some adjustments to the journal page textures.
Made some adjustments to the dragon map texture. Didn\'t realize it said Skyrim ;p
Made some adjustments to the scrolls texture. There was a slightly visible black line in-game. That should be gone now.
Removed mipmaps from the textures that you only see within an interface environment. File sizes are reduced; possibly the quality is improved.
